item.title: Mentioned by NorthernLife.ca
item.description:
Sudbury MP recovering after collision - Northern Life
Sudbury MP Glenn Thibeault is recovering after sustaining minor injuries in a collision yesterday afternoon in Sudbury, according to his staff. Richard Eberhardt, vice-president of the Sudbury NDP, said Thibeault won't be taking calls, as per doctor's orders, but ...
